snippet: Less than 24 hours after a plane crash in San Francisco killed two and injured 180 people and drew worldwide attention, 10 people died in a plane crash in Soldotna, Alaska, with much less reaction.
abstract: Less than 24 hours after a plane crash in San Francisco killed two and injured 180 people and drew worldwide attention, 10 people died in a plane crash in Soldotna, Alaska, with much less reaction.

headline.main: Plane Crash in Alaska Kills 10, but Draws Scant Attention
